name: Age Muddle
description:
Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 112

2D platformer puzzle game where your goal is to escape the dungeon full of riddles. Solve them to open your way and try not to fall in bottomless void. Also it worth to mention about strange water properties here. Some water sources grand you life and strength, and others... well opposite effect.

Controls:

  • A - Interact
  • S - Jump
  • D - Open menu or pause menu
